nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会
全国政协社会和法制委员会

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区太平桥大街23号

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一，于1998年3月设立。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, established in March 1998.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的常设机构，负责领导全国政协的工作，其下设立各专门委员会。
description.en: The standing body of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, responsible for leading the work of the CPPCC National Committee and establishing its special committees.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议

description.zh-cn: 负责处理中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会的重要日常工作，对各专门委员会进行领导。
description.en: Responsible for handling the important daily work of the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee and providing leadership to the special committees.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会法制委员会 (1988-1995)

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会法制委员会 (1988-1995)

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届、第八届全国委员会下设的专门委员会，后于1995年与妇女青年委员会合并为妇青和法制委员会。
description.en: A special committee under the 7th and 8th National Committees of the CPPCC, which was later merged with the Women and Youth Committee in 1995 to form the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇女青年委员会 (1988-1995)

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇女青年委员会 (1988-1995)

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第七届、第八届全国委员会下设的专门委员会，后于1995年与法制委员会合并为妇青和法制委员会。
description.en: A special committee under the 7th and 8th National Committees of the CPPCC, which was later merged with the Legal Affairs Committee in 1995 to form the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇青和法制委员会 (1995-1998)

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇青和法制委员会 (1995-1998)

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会下设的专门委员会，由原法制委员会和妇女青年委员会合并而成，后于1998年调整为社会和法制委员会。
description.en: A special committee under the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC, formed by the merger of the former Legal Affairs Committee and the Women and Youth Committee. It was later restructured into the Social and Legal Affairs Committee in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 香港银行家及政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Hong Kong banker and politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国法官，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese judge, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第七届全国政协法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Legal Affairs Committee of the 7th CPPCC National Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Women and Youth Committee of the 7th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第八届全国政协法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Legal Affairs Committee of the 8th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第八届全国政协妇女青年委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Women and Youth Committee of the 8th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第八届全国政协妇青和法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee of the 8th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第九届全国政协社会和法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 9th CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十届全国政协社会和法制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 10th CPPCC National Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 11th CPPCC National Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 13th CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 社会和法制委员会是在全国政协常务委员会领导下的工作机构。
description.en: The Committee for Social and Legal Affairs is a working body under the leadership of the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席会议

description.zh-cn: 社会和法制委员会是在全国政协主席会议领导下的工作机构。
description.en: The Committee for Social and Legal Affairs is a working body under the leadership of the Chairperson's Council of the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月16日，政协第九届全国委员会常务委员会第一次会议决定设置社会和法制委员会。
description.en: On March 16, 1998, the first meeting of the Standing Committee of the 9th CPPCC National Committee decided to establish the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会法制委员会 (1988-1995)
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇青和法制委员会 (1995-1998)

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月15日，全国政协常务委员会决定将法制委员会与妇女青年委员会合并调整为妇青和法制委员会。
description.en: On March 15, 1995, the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee decided to merge the Legal Affairs Committee and the Women and Youth Committee into the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇女青年委员会 (1988-1995)
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇青和法制委员会 (1995-1998)

description.zh-cn: 1995年3月15日，全国政协常务委员会决定将妇女青年委员会与法制委员会合并调整为妇青和法制委员会。
description.en: On March 15, 1995, the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee decided to merge the Women and Youth Committee and the Legal Affairs Committee into the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会妇青和法制委员会 (1995-1998)
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月16日，妇青和法制委员会被调整为社会和法制委员会。
description.en: On March 16, 1998, the Women, Youth and Legal Affairs Committee was restructured into the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会社会和法制委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十四届全国政协社会和法制委员会主任。
description.en: Serves as the Director of the Committee for Social and Legal Affairs of the 14th CPPCC National Committee.
